title: Find the Mushroom Picker
content:
nch/enter the field. There's a series of rocks to the west (-27,-81) that you can jump onto. Leads to a skeleton you can loot that has Explorer's Ring (+1 Nature, +1 Survival).

Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned ♦ Avenge the Hag Survivors ♦ Avenge the Ironhands ♦ Blind the Absolute ♦ Break Yurgi's Contract ♦ Break Yurgir's Contract ♦ Call of the Blood ♦ Capture Isobel the
